name: Fireflies (itch) (mooglerain)
description:
Credit: 

-Firefly lightbulb (this project would not be as thematic as it is without it) : Grzegorz Kostorz, go check his art. -> https://www.artstation.com/aylekin

-Character and Enemies : TooMask -> https://www.gamedevmarket.net/member/toomask

Music from Thy Majestie, an italian power metal group.

Font -> https://arcade.itch.io/fool

This is Fireflies, a game made for the 'jame gam' game jam. The theme was darkness and the special item is a lightbulb.

In this reflex/rhythm base RPG, you are the last knight of the order of Eternal Light and your mission is to banish the darkness from the magical tree. You take with you one of the last creature ready to help you in this mystery, the firefly lightbulb.

You only need WASD keys or arrow keys to play this game, and a mouse to navigate in the menu.

Like any other RPG, you and the enemy will exchange battle phase.

When you are in attack phase, the enemy will show where it will block, press any other direction key to attack where he is not blocking.

When you are in defend phase, the enemy will show where he will attack, press the same direction with the input key to block the blow.

In this RPG, you don't win or lose with Hit point, but with light level in the room, when you hit the enemy, the light will grow stronger and the enemy will slowly vanish, but if you hit his shield, or if the enemy land blows on you, the light will shrink and you will slowly vanish.
